title: FOUND TODAY…. T206 Chance Yellow  Portrait
author: JJ McGraw

posts.post_title: FOUND TODAY…. T206 Chance Yellow  Portrait
posts.post_content: Looking to buy a graded (1-1.5) presentable Frank Chance Yellow Portrait, also looking for the Evers  portrait as well. I’d consider presentable raw ones as well. Message me if you have any to turn lose.

I just listed one

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20250305/bdd79d90abd27c252b743c39476e4aaf.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
You can buy that exact Evers from me if you want, :D  Good luck with the search!
Thanks to everyone, Chase Yellow has found a new home.
